messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the rule for creating an investigator's Luck score?
3D6 and multiply by 5 for a Luck score.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What age range is recommended for an investigator?
Between 15 and 90 years old.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to EDU when an investigator is between 20 and 39 years old?
Make an improvement check for EDU.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to APP when an investigator is between 40 and 49 years old?
Reduce APP by 5.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the age range for deducting 5 points among STR and SIZ and deducting 5 points from EDU?
G 15 to 19 years old
You are a helpful AI assistant.
At what age do you make an improvement check for EDU, and what age range do you also make an improvement check for EDU?
G 20 to 39 years old, G 60 to 69 years old
You are a helpful AI assistant.
At what age do you make 3 improvement checks for EDU and deduct 10 points among STR, CON, or DEX, and reduce APP by 10?
G 50 to 59 years old
You are a helpful AI assistant.
At what age do you make 4 improvement checks for EDU, deduct 20 points among STR, CON, or DEX, and reduce APP by 15?
G 70 to 79 years old
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the maximum possible EDU value?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How do you enter half values on the investigator sheet?
Divide the percentage value by two, rounding down, and enter after the 'half' percentage value.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What should you do with the result of the EDU improvement check?
Add 1D10 percentage points to your EDU characteristic if the result is greater than your present EDU.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to EDU if the result is greater than your present EDU?
Add 1D10 percentage points to your EDU characteristic.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How do you determine the half value for a characteristic?
Divide the percentage value by two and round down.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the purpose of using half and fifth values?
To represent fractions in relation to characteristics and skills in the game.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Where can a Quick Reference Chart for Half and Fifth Values be found?
On page 49.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the percentage value when dividing it by two and rounding down?
Enter the result after the 'half' percentage value.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the term for the highest number in a characteristic value?
The full value, also known as the 'characteristic value'.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What are the fractions used in relation to characteristics and skills in the game?
Half and fifth.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Where can a Quick Reference Chart for Half and Fifth Values be found?
On page 49 of the game.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What are 'Damage Bonus' and 'Build'?
Attributes known as "Damage Bonus" (DB) and Build
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who can determine their damage bonus?
All investigators, Keeper-controlled characters and monsters
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the purpose of adding STR and SIZ?
To determine damage bonus
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What table is used to look up the total damage bonus?
Table 1: Damage Bonus and Build
